definition: to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil

sentences.english: I should like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your gracious receptionhospitality.
sentences.chinese: 我愿向你们盛情的接待与款待表示衷心的感谢。

sentences.english: In 1960 Khruschev headed a delegation to visit Indonesia and was royally treated by his host.
sentences.chinese: 率团出访印度尼西亚，他受到了主人的盛情款待。

sentences.english: Permit me first of all to thank you, our host for your extraordinary arrangements and warm hospitality.
sentences.chinese: 首先，请允许我感谢主办方的精心安排和盛情款待。

sentences.english: You must give me the chance to return your kindness when you visit here。
sentences.chinese: 您光临我处时我定要借机答谢您的盛情。

sentences.english: He added that Paris had only had one drink at a charity event when she was stopped by cops.
sentences.chinese: 他补充说帕丽斯只是在慈善活动中盛情难却喝了一杯。

sentences.english: At Peking was the Great Khan, and they were hospitably entertained.
sentences.chinese: 忽必烈汗在北京，他们受到了盛情款待。

sentences.english: I hope something will bring you to New York soon so that I can reciprocate your kindness.
sentences.chinese: 希望不久您能有机会到纽约来，使我能答谢您的盛情。

sentences.english: It wasn’t just the dogs who received treats when they entered.
sentences.chinese: 进店后得到盛情款待的不只是狗狗。

sentences.english: This is the beauty contest that could end with the judges getting an offer they can't refuse.
sentences.chinese: 这是一次连法官也盛情难却的选美比赛。

sentences.english: They were treated well and warehouses were made available to store their goods.
sentences.chinese: 他们被盛情接待，并有专用仓库存放货物。

sentences.english: I don't want to let you down.
The sharing of bounty reflects the culture of people grateful for the river that binds them together.
sentences.chinese: 这种盛情款待反映人们对河川地联系如何心存感激。

sentences.english: I've been cordially invited to join the visceral realists.
sentences.chinese: 他们盛情邀我加入本能现实主义派。

sentences.english: Van Braam and other members of the Dutch embassy were treated very well in their time in Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 范罢览和荷兰使馆的其他成员在杭州受到了盛情款待。

sentences.english: I want to thank you for the incomparable hospitality , for which your country is justly famous throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 感谢您无比盛情的款待，这也是贵国闻名于世之所在。

sentences.english: I should like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your gracious reception and hospitality.
sentences.chinese: 我愿向你们的盛情接待与款待表示衷心的感谢。

definition: to do sb the honor (of attending etc)/to put in an appearance/to show up
deference is no substitute for obedience (idiom)/(said to accept sb's request, invitation etc)
pinyin: gong1 jing4 bu4 ru2 cong2 ming4

definition: to act as host/to do the honors
I appreciate your kindness (conventional reply to turn down an offer)
